title: How do I report someone getting boosted?
body: I accidentally honored them then looked at their match history, they played a large variety of champs in ranked with about 50/50 win lose then started only playing draven/lucian and winning every game.

replies.body: We have systems that will tackle issues like this!  You can also help us investigate specific cases by using the reporting tool on the post game screen.  Thanks for looking out!
I was just curious because I honored them for being a good guy then saw they were boosting.
